about_the_game:
The Hunter's Moon tells a story about mysterious Watchers that guard the world lady Laura lives in. What was so terrifying about her gift? Is it the first time it slips into this world? And who holds the line when it does?

This DLC shows you some parts of The Knight Of The Crimson Tower from another perspective. The world around Laura saw people of her kind before, and there always were people who had to deal with it. It's time for us to get acquainted with some of them.

This is an additional half an hour-long side-story that can be played separately from the main menu of the base game. It includes:

  • new and recurring characters;
  • additional backgrounds and soundtracks;
  • some pieces of the world lore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 1.80 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL or DirectX Compatible Graphics Card (512 MB)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 3.10 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL or DirectX Compatible Graphics Card (1024 MB)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

short_description: Where did the hunter go? A short story that puts the missing pieces back into the big picture. And also makes some promises.
